name: Torn (itch) (ClownCorp Reborn)
description: Torn is a 2D puzzle game with an extremely unique art style and aesthetic, alongside a down-to-earth perspective of the daily routine that some people suffering from depression go through. The game presents the players with a variety of puzzles meant to represent the struggle that even menial tasks can become when experiencing the illness. Torn grounds itself in the commentary provided by the protagonist, acknowledging the annoyance that the trials he goes through can be, yet forcing himself to push through them in order to continue on another day.
